effect: When hit by a contact move, both the user and the attacker are afflicted with the Perish Song effect, causing them to faint in 3 turns unless switched out.
synergies: Cursola (Galarian Corsola evolution) as its signature ability
Stall strategies with trapping moves like Block or Spirit Shackle
Focus Sash or Sturdy to guarantee activation
notes: Only activates on contact moves; does not affect Pokémon with Soundproof or those already under Perish Song. High-risk ability that can force switches or trade favorably against physical attackers.
